item.description:
That's right. Worcester is having the Collings Foundation there this weekend. If we fly on Saturday, they'll even feed us...

http://www.collingsfoundation.org/cf_aircraft.htm

Collings Foundation "Wings of Freedom" will be at Worcester Airport - Main Terminal, Friday 9/14 through Monday 9/17 (B-17, B-24 & P-51).

Open House at Mass Aviation. Mass Aviation at Worcester Airport is under new ownership and is holding an open house on Saturday 9/15 from 11am - 2pm in conjunction with the Collings Foundation event. Free food and drinks.

They will be raffling off a flight in the B-17 or B-24 ($10/chance).

I'm in. Let's leave here about 11:30 for the long trek... OK, do some pattern work with tower ops and brushen up your flying...

Off we go again...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fly all the way to ORH and land with the WWll boys.
